emails.title: Wave hello with video, reactions and more now in huddles
emails.body: In the early days of the pandemic, audio-only huddles helped recreate the informal discussions that traditionally took place in office cafés and hallways. Whether your team is remote, in the office, or a mix of both, working alongside your colleagues is as important as ever.
